attributes.action: GIVE THE PEOPLE THEIR DEMOCRATIC RIGHT TO A FINAL PEOPLES VOTE ON BREXIT
attributes.additional_details:
We keep hearing the UK is a democratic country, but politicians are trying to overrule the people and decide between themselves how the country should proceed.

This is not a decision for politicians, this is a decision for the people. 

Give the people their democratic right to a final Peoples Vote on leaving the EU as many people have changed their mind, especially now a lot of the statements have been found to be lies. 

Stop wasting time in parliament and give the people the final option.
attributes.background:
During the EU Referendum, many false promises and misleading statements were made by both Leave and Remain Campaigns.

The people of the United Kingdom voted to leave but many were voting on misleading information that was produced by the leave campaign. 

The people deserve a final say.
